attributes.action: Form a government of national unity in the aftermath of the EU referendum.
attributes.background: The UK needs a government of national unity, crossing traditional party lines and representing all regions. The main task of this government would be to decide on how to execute the will of the British people to leave the EU, while keeping the interest of the nation at heart.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/137155
